price: 12. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Rabbiyow! Waxaan ka cabsan inay i beeniyaan,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
